# Version 2024.04.01

This release includes critical fixes and enhancements to improve system stability and functionality. Key updates include adjustments to import parameters, improved synchronization processes, and bug fixes related to sprint management.&#x20;

| **Date**        | 17 Oct 2024                                                                                                                           |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Version**     | hotfix-2024-04-1                                                                                                                      |
| **Description** | This hotfix addresses key improvements in import parameter handling, transport domain preferences, and sprint synchronization issues. |

#### **Bug Fixes and Enhancements**

Before you share the page, review the contents of each Jira issue and remove any sensitive data.
